topic.title: Any licensed hams in the northeast US operating on 2m packet?
topic.body:
Obviously it would be unwise to post any callsigns publicly here, but I'm almost always on 144.39. 

Also general ham radio thread

1565444879_1BogRKz3GcSLVPYJbcFW2EfbDEoin.body: They can't keep getting away with it

1565570944_1KUSKrffaR1sfLwxZUXUPshLpKhh5.body: Boomerposting has already made it to ZeroNet?

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: 4chan is down... the great shoah has begun

> [steeljacket](#comment_14_18YwqjZF3kZjfbWcsvyfzzL8okGn2DRW1a): Does this mean you filthy weebs are going to invade zeronet now? Is this the end of us?

I've been on zeronet for a while, but I also use 4chan. Most folks on 4chan don't even know what ZN is, outside of probably /g/

1565584272_1F8BHc6FztvWRy9cttVXLj22DSSvM.body: It's been down sporadically for what seems like random users. 4chan was down completely for me earlier, but now it's fine. I even checked on one of those "is it down?" websites, and it said it was. You guys know it's only a matter of time, they've wanted to get rid of 4chan for ages

> [bigbadbob](#comment_207_1CLhLYdMKjXtium9yjuRkSnFvPfdoUTXAj): It can't seem to post in 4chan using a vpn or tor...   Anyone know if 8chan was like that?

4chan has never allowed vpn or tor posting, I'm not sure about 8chan

> [bigbadbob](#comment_208_1CLhLYdMKjXtium9yjuRkSnFvPfdoUTXAj): I could never make it work so i always just lurked... for the most part [...]

Oh yeah, I get what you mean. I remember I tried to post through Tor a few times and it never let me so I assumed you never could.

> [bigbadbob](#comment_210_1CLhLYdMKjXtium9yjuRkSnFvPfdoUTXAj): I remember once i got banned... It was kinda disturbing at the time.  Was just shills shillin

I got a 2-week ban from /k/ once because because someone accidentally posted a picture of a pistol on top of a letter they received, and it had their address on it, so I posted a screenshot of his mom's facebook page lol

1565638691_1Hb5zuymuNq9rhYhhoYuAPGMXpxsp.body: lmao this discord tranny has been spamming this smoothbrain shit for like 12 hours

1565639249_1Hb5zuymuNq9rhYhhoYuAPGMXpxsp.body: You realize everyone can mute you right? Communism is for retards, goodbye

1565639604_1LdgxNSynzpd5Vyi3Ej12adEuWbo1.body: Go to the actual ZeroTalk zite, hover your cursor next to their name, and you should see three black dots. Click the dots, click "mute this user"

1565627986_1KUSKrffaR1sfLwxZUXUPshLpKhh5.body: I think that the quality of posts stays higher here than on average forums because it takes at least a slight degree of computer literacy to get here. There are tools to install and configure, it's not just a matter of opening your browser and entering a URL. As a result, it sort of auto-filters the lowest-tier morons. Plus, everyone knows that if they make annoying posts, they can be muted by everyone else in two clicks.

1565647351_1KUSKrffaR1sfLwxZUXUPshLpKhh5.body: You're not supposed to set Tor to "No proxy", you're supposed to add 127.0.0.1 to the "No proxy for:" list on the same menu.

> [8uuz1t9mx4ye9n03](#comment_1_16HGBgwAhEsh55DsJK1RhNvMFMJZiydRFE): If you do this you can create a breach on Tor browser. Please read this on GitHub to know more: [...]

Yes, but there are ways to prevent that from happening, as discussed on tor ticket 10419. You can use NoScript ABE to prevent remote pages from loading local resources.

1565652073_1KUSKrffaR1sfLwxZUXUPshLpKhh5.body: Why would you want there to be millions of people using ZeroNet? So every zite becomes Facebook-tier, and we get thousands of posts like this from boomers like you daily? I don't understand what problem you have with reading the FAQ, posting in the FAQ thread, and reading through source code to understand how things work. You don't have to post a thread every single time you don't understand something, and then get pissy when people try to tell you how things actually work.

> [bvcfbfbcbcvd](#comment_24_1KUSKrffaR1sfLwxZUXUPshLpKhh5PXWm7): At this point, I can tell that you are trolls/sockpuppets. Sad beginning for ZeroNet, when you can't get the most basic questions answered and only psychos/illiterate dumbasses reply.

It's not trolling for people to tell you that you're posting dumb things when you're posting dumb things. Please just read the docs and learn how ZN works, it's not necessary for every thought that enters your head to be its own thread.

1565657679_1DST8biLYRqXPXeJGhxUt1dBsT6QM.body: wtf lol, a wojak cult? The home page is pretty cool, but that pdf is pretty gay.

Anybody remember that UFO cult that all committed suicide because they thought Hale-Bopp was an alien spacecraft coming to take them to the next stage of human evolution? Their original clearnet website, still intact from 1997: http://heavensgate.com/

1565767588_15ZG53yDqMJyxRy3jfkC4NGeKapAC.body:
> [arhipo](#comment_4_1GyzQuxTLxM4VZHrscHm5iY5W4B8b6f6QL): Quite unrelated but are you still using sstv frequencies ?

Unfortunately I haven't been able to get on SSTV because all the SSTV utilities for Linux are horribly unmaintained and they don't work correctly.

1565880498_1CyoFuqywpEgKYPHjQUui3TJQuEDq.body:
> [theecollector](#comment_35_15rMfe5FVSWwMffJvTpBUq9dFiLQPNxkuU): cool if privacy is a crime the i forbid you to ware clothes and you now have to walk around naked for everyone to see you needle dick. Fuck outa here LEAðŸš¨

dude, his name says "piracy" lol

1565920396_1H79P7Dn1eqyVFFhsPux4ZyApMuhz.body: This post glows in the dark.

1565922890_16tiWQCvXDH6r8GWNGUzvvnAHqN89.body:
(((science agrees)))
You're talking about sociology, which is not really science. There is no biological basis for this "gender spectrum" that you guys have been proposing. Transgender individuals exhibiting abnormal brain scans doesn't mean that gender is a spectrum, it means that mentally ill folks exhibit abnormal brain scans.
